body_html: They will have different initial values if they are randomly initialized. TF requires you to specify an op seed when creating a random initializer if you want determinism; otherwise any change in the graph structure can change the internal seed used for the initializer leading to different values.
body_text: They will have different initial values if they are randomly initialized. TF requires you to specify an op seed when creating a random initializer if you want determinism; otherwise any change in the graph structure can change the internal seed used for the initializer leading to different values.
body: They will have different initial values if they are randomly initialized. TF requires you to specify an op seed when creating a random initializer if you want determinism; otherwise any change in the graph structure can change the internal seed used for the initializer leading to different values.
